help.short: Name of the Network Fabric Controller.
Name of the Network Fabric Controller.
The geo-location where the resource lives

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$resource.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="infrastructureExpressRouteConnections" arg="$resource.properties.infrastructureExpressRouteConnections" identifiers="expressRouteCircuitId">
<prop type="array<@ExpressRouteConnectionInformation_create>" name="workloadExpressRouteConnections" arg="$resource.properties.workloadExpressRouteConnections" identifiers="expressRouteCircuitId">
